name: 丁氏蓉
objective:
本課程將從基本越南語發音教起，並練習基本越南語會話，另外透過越南文化簡介，讓學生在學習越語的過程中，對越南的風俗民情有基本的認識。
This course will emphasize on Vietnamese alphabet, pronunciation, and daily conversation. Furthermore, through brief introdction the culture of Vietnam, hope to arouse students’ intstreset in learning Vietnamese.
